page.title: 05THE COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: We interviewed Margaret Little about the community centre and her job as its leader. The centre was built in 1979 and finished in 1980 but was not opened until 1981. The centre was built for people who live in this area. About 150 people come to the centre weekly. There are lots of classes to join including yoga, art and learning other languages. The hall can be hired for private events. Margaret is the only paid worker apart from 2 cleaners and 2 youth workers. All the rest are volunteers. Margaret is the full time leader for the Birkby and Fartown centre. She works 37 hours a week. She has been working here for 9 months. The centre sells pop,crisps and sweets but it is not licensed to sell alcohol.
